# @axm-internal/hono-kit

Version: 0.1.0

Purpose:
- Opinionated Hono server wrapper with Zod-first validation

Public surface:
- export(s) from `src/index.ts`

Intended usage:
- Internal @axm-internal consumers

Non-goals:
- External/public API stability

Stability expectations:
- Semver within axm-internals
